entities.departureInfo: Invalides (Métro), 107 Rue de l'Université, 75007 Paris, FranceTraveler pickup is offeredPlease note we provide pick up and drop off only from hotels located in Paris. Make sure you contact our customer care, at least 48hours before departure, by phone 0033 1 70371426 or email info@citywonders.com to advise exact pick up/drop off location.

descriptions.shortDescription: There’s only one way to visit the extravagant Palace of Versailles: in style. All tours, access and roundtrip train transfers are included, so all you have to do is enjoy your travel through time on this one-of-a-kind tour developed for you. Explore the Grand Apartments and State Rooms, the famous Hall of Mirrors and Gardens in a tour designed for refined tastes.

entities.name: Versailles Palace & Gardens Guided Tour from Paris with Optional Fountain Show
entities.returnInfo: Palace of Versailles, Place d'Armes, 78000 Versailles, France

entities.departureInfo: 38 Avenue de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Save your precious Paris sightseeing time with this skip-the-line Eiffel Tower ticket. One of only a few priority admission tickets to include a live guide and commentary, this 1-hour experience ensures a hassle-free visit to one of the world’s busiest monuments. Choose a start time when you book, then walk with your host to the second level, enjoying a relaxing entrance to the Eiffel Tower plus ample free time. Wander the viewing levels, and gaze out at Notre Dame Cathedral, Les Invalides, and more — all from up high.

entities.name: Skip the Line: Eiffel Tower 2nd Floor Priority Access Ticket with Host

entities.departureInfo: Port de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Paris has so much to offer it’s worth seeing it three ways: In the air, on the road and on water! This four-hour tour is the perfect intro to the city of "l’Amour", and will no doubt be the start of your own personal love story with Paris. 

Discover the Paris of the Parisians and travel through time with the Histopad! Thanks to its interactive functionalities, this new immersive city tour will allow you, in exclusivity, to understand better the history of Paris and its architecture over the centuries. You will visit the most famous neighbourhoods and monuments of the capital, through 3D reconstructions, 2D before/after sliders, enriched with audio commentaries. A playful tour designed for the whole family, for young and old!

Then embark on a cruise along the Seine, under its many bridges, before scaling the heights of the Grande Dame (the Eiffel Tower to you and me!) taking in the magnificent views from her second floor.

entities.name: Eiffel Tower Skip-the-Line Access Summit Option Seine River Cruise & Paris Tour

entities.departureInfo: 1 Rue de la Légion d'Honneur, 75007 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Treat yourself with double luxury! - the incredible sights of Paris, paired with fine French cuisine and champagne. Leisurely seated and surrounded by panoramic windows, you’ll glide past iconic landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower and Notre Dame along the romantic river Seine, with an unforgettable 3-course gourmet meal on the menu. 

Get a taste of the City of Love with a champagne dinner at this unique dining venue. Romance package

A spectacular gastronomic experience awaits you, courtesy of our Chef and his crew. 

The menu consists of a choice of starters, main course, and a variety of delicious desserts and a glass (or 1/2 bottle ) of Champagne. 

Boarding will begin at 6.15 pm (or at 8:45pm) the foot of the Orsay Museum.

entities.name: Paris Seine River Gourmet Dinner Cruise with Champagne Exclusive Viator

entities.departureInfo: Place de la Madeleine, 75008 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Wander through the luxurious, hidden streets, garden & passages of Paris with a local. Savour a sugary-sweet macaron at a popular Parisian food shop. Enjoy the elegant surroundings of the Louvre’s garden. Admire medieval & renaissance-era architecture. Become a cheese connoisseur at a Parisian fromagerie. Experience the bustling vibe of a busy French market as you become a Parisian for a day. This small group tour is limited to maximum 12 guests.

entities.name: Paris Small Group or Private Walking Tour: Secret Sites and Hidden Gems

entities.departureInfo: La Flamme, 6 Avenue de Wagram, 75008 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Discover the unparalleled beauty of the home and gardens of Claude Monet where he lived and painted for the last 40 years of his life.

entities.name: Giverny including Monet’s Gardens and Gravesite Small-Group Half-Day Trip

entities.departureInfo: Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Can you imagine a more romantic way to experience Paris than by a luxury horse and carriage? Just sit back and relax. (Routes are non contractual and vary according to local traffic and police regulations. The Royal route includes a bottle of champagne.

Romance Route 
Eiffel Tower - Avenue de la Bourdonnais - rue Saint-Dominique - Avenue du Mal Galliéni - Pont Alexandre III - Avenue Winston Churchill - Avenue Marigny - avenue Gabriel - Rue de Ponthieu - Avenue Franklin Roosevelt - Rond-point des Champs-Elysees - Avenue Montaigne - Pont de l'Alma - Avenue Rapp - rue joseph bouvard - Place Jacques Rueff - Avenue de Suffren - Eiffel Tower. 

Royal (In addition to Romance Route)
Additional: Rue du Fbg Saint-Honoré - rue de Castiglione - Place Vendôme - Rue de la Paix - Place de l'Opéra - Avenue de l'Opéra - Pyramide du Louvre - Rue de Rivoli

Heavenly (In addition to Royal Route)
Quai de la Mégisserie - Pont Notre-Dame - Notre-Dame - Quai de la Corse - Pont-Neuf

entities.name: Paris Private Romantic Horse & Carriage Ride

entities.departureInfo: 22 Rue Jean Rey, 75015 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Like nature? Love Impressionism? Read on! Let us whisk you away on a half-day trip to the village of Giverny where Monet and other Impressionists set up home in the 19th Century. After a short one-and-a-half-hour ride from Paris, you’ll find yourself in this quaint little village in Normandy, where you’ll visit Monet’s exquisite house and gardens. Your art historian guide will animate your tour around the flowerbeds that proved a source of inspiration for Monet, past the water lily pond made famous in the Nymphéas series and across the Japanese bridge that pops up so often in his work. Then you’ll explore Monet’s house, almost untouched by the passage of time.

entities.name: Giverny and Monet House Half-Day Guided From Paris

entities.departureInfo: 9 Place Saint-Michel, 75006 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: See the best of Paris in just 4hrs ! Breeze by the walking and bus tours on a Blue Bike and get up close and personal with Paris' top Monuments in a fun and safe way! You’ll take home some of the best memories and photos of your entire trip.

entities.name: Paris Highlights Bike Tour with Eiffel Tower, Louvre and Notre-Dame

entities.departureInfo: 40 Rue de Bretagne, 75003 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: This 3.5-Hour Food tour will take place around the Marais Area, in the third arrondissement of Paris, starting from rue de Bretagne, and ending at the Hôtel de Ville. Departing in Paris Oldest Market, the tour will take you to some of the most amazing food shops and artisans. Known as one of the most open-minded area of Paris, the Marais is home for the oldest market in Paris : le marché des enfants rouges. The Parisians love to stroll its aisles and indulge themselves with lots of fine product to try. Discover this iconic area and its secrets!

entities.name: Marais The Original District Food & Wine Tasting Tour

entities.departureInfo:
Pickup Details
Upon arrival at the airport you must collect your luggage and proceed to the customs hall. The driver will be waiting for you holding a sign with the lead traveler's name written on it.
Other

 
  Paris, Paris, Ile-de-France

entities.name: Paris Private Arrival Transfer: Charles de Gaulle (CDG) or Orly (ORY)

entities.departureInfo: Place du Trocadero, Place du Trocadéro, 75016 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Remember the victories and the losses of the D-Day landings with a tour of Normandy’s four most significant World War II sites. Visit a museum in a real German bunker on Utah Beach. Walk among memorials to 10,000 fallen at the American Cemetery, with a poignant view over Omaha Beach, where Allied forces faced terrible odds. The, experience this region’s rich culinary history with a two-course lunch and some local apple cider.

entities.name: Normandy D-Day Landing Beaches Day Trip with Cider Tasting & Lunch from Paris

entities.departureInfo: Port de la Conférence, 75008 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
See Paris from the water on a 3-hour Seine River cruise on the iconic Bateaux-Mouches, which includes dinner. You'll admire the city's elegant architecture all lit up for the evening as you pass by landmarks such as Notre-Dame Cathedral and the Eiffel Tower. When booking, select from the Prestige or Excellence menus; you also have the option to select a holiday cruise, when available (duration may differ).

Please note that for groups (more than 15 people) a unique choice of menu is compulsory.

entities.name: Bateaux Mouches Seine River Paris by Night Dinner Cruise with Live Music

entities.departureInfo: Boulevard de Clichy, Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Stroll through Paris' most bohemian neighborhood on a guided afternoon walk through Montmartre. You'll see where famous painters lived and worked in this beautiful hilltop part of Paris, with its windmills, cabarets and monuments. Begin your two-hour Paris Walking Tour of Montmartre just across the street from the most famous cabaret in the world - the Moulin Rouge. Then follow cobblestone streets to the highest point in Paris at the white Sacre Coeur Basilica, which offers breathtaking views in all directions.

entities.name: Montmartre and Sacre Coeur Walking Tour in Paris
entities.returnInfo: Sacré-Cœur, 35 Rue du Chevalier de la Barre, 75018 Paris, France

entities.departureInfo: 22 Rue Jean Rey, 75015 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Discover the pure beauty of Bruges in a day. From monasteries to cathedrals and palaces, you’ll be guided though the city center that well deserves its UNESCO world heritage title. Admire the splendor of original medieval architecture and enjoy the fascinating story of its history. Take in the incredible sites of the Venice of the North cruising along its romantic canals and take time out to leisurely lunch and shop. 

The city’s romantic charm and stunning architecture make this a perfect day to remember.

entities.name: Bruges Guided Visit From Paris Full Day Trip

entities.departureInfo: GetYourGuide Versailles, 10 Avenue du Général de Gaulle, 78000 Versailles, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Discover the Palace of Versailles and skip the long lines at the entrance with this 90-minute guided tour. Choose the time that better suits your program and make your own way to Versailles. Your guide will take you on an unforgettable tour of the Hall Of Mirrors and State Apartments. Stroll around the famous French gardens at your own leisure after the tour (additional entrance ticket required on musical or fountain show days).

entities.name: Versailles Palace Skip-the-line Classic Guided Tour
entities.returnInfo: Palace of Versailles, Place d'Armes, 78000 Versailles, France

entities.departureInfo: 38 Avenue de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
With this skip-the-line Eiffel Tower entrance, take advantage one of only a few priority admission tickets to the tower that include a host and commentary, providing a hassle-free visit to one of the world’s busiest monuments. Accompanied by your host from outside the main gates to the second level, you'll enjoy a relaxing entrance at the Eiffel Tower with ample free time to wander around the viewing platforms and gaze out at Notre-Dame Cathedral, Les Invalides, and more. Then head to the tower's summit (aka 3rd level) for a rarer view, as many visitors don't go up to this additional platform. Select a time for your entry when booking.

Please make sure to arrive at our meeting point fifteen minutes before the start of your activity. Latecomers will miss out.

entities.name: Skip the Line Ticket: Eiffel Tower Summit Priority Access with Host

The transfer services are available from 4am until 11pm, 7 days a week.

descriptions.shortDescription: The "Latin Quarter + Le Marais Bike Tour” is a truly local experience. It's for those who want to get to know Paris' hidden charms and see what makes it so captivating to the locals.

entities.name: Paris Hidden Secrets Small-Group Bike Tour
